suggestions: 18. Waiver. No failure or delay by any Party in enforcing any provision of this Agreement shall constitute a waiver of that provision or any other provision contained herein. The waiver of any breach of any provision under this Agreement by any Party shall not be deemed to be a waiver of any preceding or subsequent breach, nor shall any waiver constitute a continuing waiver.
originalTexts: 18. Waiver. The waiver of any breach of any provision under this Agreement by any Party shall not be deemed to be a waiver of any preceding or subsequent breach, nor shall any waiver constitute a continuing waiver.
